name: Sider 5.0: Deep Research with Wisebase
tagline: Mimic Human Research & Save Findings in AI Knowledge Base
description: Sider 5.0 Deep Research mimics human research by auto-scanning 100+ sources, reflecting, noting and highlighting insights. It crafts expert-level, interactive reports in mintues. All findings are auto-saved to Wisebase—AI knowledge base that evolves with you.

name: timeOS 3.0
tagline: Really, really, ridiculously good meeting notes for macOS
description: timeOS summarizes your entire workday: Phone calls, WhatsApp, Google Meet, and Zoom, all without a generic bot joining the call. Designed for multilingual and ambitious teams. What's new? timeOS for macOS・Invisible AI for Zoom・Team Workspace

name: Tweek
tagline: Paper-like calendar app now with themes and sub-tasks
description: Less distraction with simple and powerful calendar.

name: Superlines
tagline: Get discovered in AI search results
description: Track and measure your brand’s visibility across AI Chats like ChatGPT, Gemini, Perplexity, Mistral and Claude. See where your brand is mentioned, compare against competitors, and understand how to improve your visibility in AI Search results!

name: Meetify
tagline: Find a time and place to meet. Calendly meets Google Maps.
description: Unlike other scheduling tools, Meetify helps you coordinate both the time and place, whether you are meeting at a coffee shop, a restaurant, or virtually if needed. It’s simple, personal, and flexible, built for real-world meetings.

name: Attention Insight FIGMA Plugin
tagline: Instantly understand user behavior to optimize designs
description: Need to launch your website but you’re still moving the “Sign up” button around? Decide faster with Attention Insight! Analyse attention heatmaps, compare iterations using data, and prove to stakeholders that your design is the best.

name: Autodraft AI
tagline: Create 4K animations + custom characters for YouTube
description: Create 4K Animated Stories, Rhymes & Explainer Videos without skills or costly softwares & Monetise on YouTube. Generate AI backgrounds, Text to Animated Characters, Lifelike Voiceovers, AI BGM, and Editor—all in one place!

name: Predibase Reinforcement Fine-Tuning
tagline: LLM reinforcement fine-tuning platform to improve LLM output
description: Predibase has released the first Reinforcement Fine-Tuning platform, promising a groundbreaking approach to customizing LLMs using reinforcement learning. Use RFT to train open-source LLMs that outperform GPT-4, even when labeled data is limited.

name: Codegen
tagline: AI developer that analyzes + improves codebase 24/7 in Slack
description: Our AI assistant helps engineering teams analyze, modify, and improve codebases through natural language directly in Slack. Ship faster with fewer errors and create production-ready PRs in minutes.

name: Diamond
tagline: Graphite's agentic AI-powered code review companion
description: Diamond gives you instant, codebase-aware feedback that eliminates review cycles and helps you ship higher-quality code faster. Works with or without Graphite, free up to 100 PRs/month.

name: Dock: Developer Optimization Content Kit
tagline: AI-powered tool to boost your app's visibility and downloads
description: Dock is a powerful macOS app that supercharges App Store optimization. With AI-driven insights, manage keywords, screenshots, and reviews. Analyze competitors, generate smart content, and maximize your app's visibility and downloads effortlessly.

name: PopTranslate
tagline: A better way to translate text with AI on Mac
description: PopTranslate is a Mac AI translation app featuring comparison of translation engines, OCR recognition, and natural voice reading to simplify cross-language communication.

name: TextureIt
tagline: Customize and generate textures for games and 3d designs.
description: TextureIt.Pro is tool to get, share and customize simple textures for video games and 3d designs. Start modifying and apply effects on texture and use that for your game development.

name: SeabassAI
tagline: Discover real-world AI applications and AI-built programs
description: Discover real-world AI applications and AI-built programs. Free listing of projects.

name: Zopi
tagline: Bulk import & automated fulfillment with global suppliers
description: Zopi helps merchants to simplify dropshipping journey: from product discovery and bulk import to store like Shopify, WooCommerce to automation fulfillment. (Similar to Zendrop, AutoDS, Dsers, CJDropshipping, Spocket)

name: Acctual
tagline: Create global invoices and get paid same day
description: Acctual customers can now invoice globally and receive payment the same day. 🪙 Clients pay in stablecoins or fiat 🏦 You get paid directly to your wallet or bank account 🌎 For businesses & freelancers in 130+ countries 🚀 Payments deposit same day

name: FacePic
tagline: Professional headshots and dating photos in 5 min
description: Transform your everyday photos into professional headshots using AI. Perfect for LinkedIn, resumes, dating apps, and social media. Upload your selfies and get studio-quality portraits in minutes—no photographer needed. Look your best everywhere.

name: TurnKey Directories
tagline: The fastest way to build business directories on WordPress
description: Create up to 50K Business Listings in WordPress Completely Automated, in 3 Easy Steps. No coding. No subscriptions. Own it forever.

name: Subscribed 3.0
tagline: The most reliable business software search
description: Subscribed helps digital professionals find business software. With easy comparisons of +100m possible comparison, and seeing reviews of others, we simplify the process. Get insights on 10,000+ tools instantly. It's like Google Flights, for business software!

name: EzReply - AI That Sounds Like You
tagline: 1-Click Perfect Replies in Seconds to Grow Effortlessly
description: EzReply: AI-powered Chrome extension for authentic replies. Train it on your style in minutes to beat the algorithm with less work. Sounds like you, saves up to 9+ hours weekly, and grows your brand effortlessly. Grow Your X/Twitter Without The Effort!
